title: Haviing Connection Issues
body: After the update today  the game won't let me get past loading screen and if I do it keeps trying to reconnect. The game says my ping is 55 and when i check my cmd and ping websites i'm not losing packages, so I assume it can't be me. Also when i switch to team fortress 2 and overwatch I don't have any ping problems and not failing to connect to those games.

replies.body: It doesn't seem like we've been having any widespread NA servers issues right at this moment, but I'm curious if you were trying to ping the League servers specifically or if you were pinging something like Googles servers. Run a quick traceroute to the NA servers at 104.160.131.1 and post the results here so I can see if something is going wrong.

> [{quoted}](name=Broporo,realm=NA,application-id=osqw6G4M,discussion-id=Tnwsx0fW,comment-id=0000,timestamp=2017-12-14T04:55:15.602+0000)
>
> It doesn't seem like we've been having any widespread NA servers issues right at this moment, but I'm curious if you were trying to ping the League servers specifically or if you were pinging something like Googles servers. Run a quick traceroute to the NA servers at 104.160.131.1 and post the results here so I can see if something is going wrong.

Pinging 104.160.131.1 with 32 bytes of data:
Reply from 104.160.131.1: bytes=32 time=53ms TTL=54
Reply from 104.160.131.1: bytes=32 time=48ms TTL=54
Reply from 104.160.131.1: bytes=32 time=50ms TTL=54
Reply from 104.160.131.1: bytes=32 time=48ms TTL=54

Ping statistics for 104.160.131.1:
    Packets: Sent = 4, Received = 4, Lost = 0 (0% loss),
Approximate round trip times in milli-seconds:
    Minimum = 48ms, Maximum = 53ms, Average = 49ms

Well that's good, doesn't look like any packet loss going on from that trace. Still strange you're having so many issue staying connected to our servers. 

I want you to go ahead and hit up our techs in a [**ticket**](https://support.riotgames.com/hc/en-us/requests/new), as this seems like it might be something deeper in your system, or possibly ISP related and I wouldn't want to steer you in the wrong direction only to have you wait longer for a fix!!
